titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures containing methyl 4-({[(3-methoxy-4-methyl-5-oxo-4,5-dihydro-1H-1,2,4-triazol-1-yl)carbonyl]-amino}sulfonyl)-5-methylthiophene-3-carboxylate, isoxaflutole, and cyprosulfamide.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/26/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures containing methyl 4-({[(3-methoxy-4-methyl-5-oxo-4,5-dihydro-1H-1,2,4-triazol-1-yl)carbonyl]-amino}sulfonyl)-5-methylthiophene-3-carboxylate, isoxaflutole, and cyprosulfamide.
